title: How to disable notification peeking in Android 12 beta?
content: I would like to stop all notifications from automatically creating a drop-down window, but to only show notification icons at the top. I couldn't figure out how to do it in either Android 11 and still can't in the new 12 beta. How do I turn off this notification peeking?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4 XL
